traits.name: Innate Spellcasting
traits.desc: The cikavak's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 11). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components: * At will: speak with animals * 1/day: silence

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, range 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d4 + 2) piercing damage.
